title: Advanced Parser Optimization & AST Caching
description: High-performance parsing with SIMD optimizations and intelligent AST caching

goals.title: High-Performance Binary Compilation Engine
deliverables: BinaryCompilationEngine.cs - SIMD-optimized compilation with JIT and compression
Performance monitoring with real-time metrics and counters
Thread-safe concurrent operations and resource management
Multiple compression algorithms (LZ4, GZIP, ZStandard)
Memory-mapped file access for zero-copy loading

goals.title: Optimized Data Structures for TuskTsk AST
deliverables: OptimizedDataStructures.cs - Object pooling and intelligent caching
Memory-efficient collections and data structures
Cache eviction policies (LRU and expiration)
Performance counters and real-time monitoring
Thread-safe concurrent operations

goals.title: Advanced Parser Optimization with SIMD and Memory-Mapped Parsing
deliverables: SIMDParser.cs - Vectorized text processing with AVX2/SSE4.1 support
Memory-mapped file parsing for large configuration files
Streaming parsing for multi-gigabyte files
Platform-specific optimizations with fallbacks
Concurrent parsing with load balancing

goals.title: AST Caching System with Intelligent Caching and Dependency Tracking
deliverables: ASTCachingSystem.cs - Multi-level caching with dependency tracking
Intelligent cache invalidation based on file dependencies
Cache warming and preloading strategies
Background maintenance and cleanup tasks
Hash-based change detection and performance monitoring

technical_achievements: Complete high-performance binary compilation engine with SIMD optimizations
Optimized data structures with object pooling and intelligent caching
Advanced parser with vectorized text processing and memory-mapped parsing
Intelligent AST caching system with dependency tracking
Thread-safe concurrent operations across all components
Multi-level caching architecture with intelligent invalidation
Background maintenance and cache warming strategies
